entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
